name: Pix'Snake
description:
Welcome to Pix'Snake.

In this game you can play the famous game of the snake:

  • Eat apples (red square)
  • Don't bite your tail
  •  Don't touch the edges
  •  Personalize your snake

 ... and blows up your highscore.

System: Android
WARNING this game is in development: thank you for giving a constructive comment.
